front.title: Self-termination Mechanism for Anycast DNS Service

abstract.t: Anycast has in recent years become popular for DNS servers and widelyapplied to several root nams servers and to other commercial nameservers. For Anycast-based DNS service reliability, this documentsdescribes the use of self-termination mechanism in Anycast-based DNSservice operation when the service becomes unavailable due to eventssuch as hardware failures
